SummaryEnglish: Our MC finds out that his school requires him to join a club and during his reluctant search he stumbles upon Tejina-senpai attempting magic tricks in her clubroom. Tejina-senpai has massive stage fright however and so now that she has an audience her attempts are simply comedic.

1.TitleEnglish: The Unknown Sempai | Sempai in a Box | Sempai Calls | Sempai and the Pigeon
1.SummaryEnglish: 1, The Unknown Sempai: A cute but strange sempai appears! 2, Sempai in a Box: Sempai is cute but vulgar! 3, Sempai Calls: Keys, melon bread, and soaked sempai. 4, Sempai and the Pigeon: Sempai gives birth to a pigeon.

2.TitleEnglish: Sempai Bends | Impenetrable Sempai | Sempai Shifts Responsibility | The Lady Who Stinks at Magic | Sempai Gets Serious
2.SummaryEnglish: 1, Sempai Bends: Sempai trains her fingertips. 2, Impenetrable Sempai: Sempai shows her butt. 3, Sempai Shifts Responsibility: A hairy animal crawls over Sempai. 4, The Lady Who Stinks at Magic: A quick-change outdoors. 5, Sempai Gets Serious: Assistant's confinement is a se~cret

3.TitleEnglish: Sempai's Discomfort | Pop Quiz Sempai | Conquering Sempai | Kimono Sempai | Sempai Off Campus
3.SummaryEnglish: 1, Sempai's Discomfort: Sempai's mortal enemy? Her big sister appears! 2, Pop Quiz Sempai: Sempai wears a flower print. 3, Conquering Sempai: Senpai really gives birth this time. 4, Kimono Sempai: Lots of wazuma. 5, Sempai Off Campus: An outdoor survival game?

4.TitleEnglish: Celebrating Sempai | Scouting Sempai | Pigeon, Pigeon, and Sempai | Sempai Finishes the Job | Magic Club Sempai
4.SummaryEnglish: Celebrating Sempai: Together With Sempai, One Thousand Yen Per!<3 Scouting Sempai: Sempai is lonely and loses her mind. Pigeon, Pigeon, and Sempai: Sempai takes solace in pigeons. Sempai Finishes the Job: Sempai is pierced, prodded, and exposed. Magic Club Sempai: Sempai enjoys her time alone.

5.TitleEnglish: Observers and Sempai | Onion Sempai | Chemistry Sempai | Unexpected Sempai | Inviting Sempai
5.SummaryEnglish: Observers and Sempai: The terror of the school ghosts?! Onion Sempai: Peel it and see!<3 Chemistry Sempai: One-on-one experiments with Madara-san.<3 Unexpected Sempai: Assistant loves her plush body?! Inviting Sempai: Exciting times at Sempai's house!

6.TitleEnglish: Unknown Sempai | Gyaru-Pan Sempai | Measuring Sempai | Suspicious Sempai
6.SummaryEnglish: Unknown Sempai: Street performance gyaru and fat dude attack! Gyaru-Pan Sempai: Street performance is... awesome!! Measuring Sempai: Sempai is over 2kg <3 Suspicious Sempai: Sempai's a master magician when hypnotized!

7.TitleEnglish: Creative Sempai | Fund-Raising Sempai | Pool Sempai | Overcoming Sempai
7.SummaryEnglish: Creative Sempai: Saki-chan's aren't that big. Fund-Raising Sempai: Let those who cannot work leave the magic club! Pool Sempai: Water escape in a school swimsuit!! Overcoming Sempai: Sempai won't get stage fright in front of "handsome" assistant.

8.TitleEnglish: Chinese Sempai | Mentalist Sempai | Mikan Sempai | Internet Sempai | Delivery Sempai
8.SummaryEnglish: Chinese Sempai: Is Sempai more powerful than 4000 years of history?! Mentalist Sempai: Sempai sees all! Mikan Sempai: Sempai won't make it alone. Internet Sempai: The magic club website is 18+! Delivery Sempai: Sempai entertains the good boys and girls.

9.TitleEnglish: Biased Sempai | Make-Up Exam Sempai | Ice Cream Sempai | Swimsuit Sempai
9.SummaryEnglish: Biased Sempai: Time for se~crets <3 Make-Up Exam Sempai: Scheming! Drowning in schemes! Ice Cream Sempai: Ice cream later? Swimsuit Sempai: Assistant and Ma-kun's revealing swimsuit plan!

10.TitleEnglish: Beach Sempai | Crab Sempai | Watermelon Sempai | Fireworks Sempai
10.SummaryEnglish: Beach Sempai: Beach! Swimsuits! Training camp! Crab Sempai: Lying on the beach with Madara-san<3 Watermelon Sempai: Sempai is the watermelon-splitting champion. Fireworks Sempai: Sempai is not allowed fire!

11.TitleEnglish: Four Balls Sempai | Ventriloquism Sempai | Tailing Sempai
11.SummaryEnglish: Sempai practices magic tricks with four balls. Saki practices ventriloquism with a hand puppet of her brother. The rest of the Magic Club tail Sempai after school to find out if she has a boyfriend.

12.TitleEnglish: Growing Sempai | Unfailing Sempai | Competitive Sempai | Silent Sempai | Bunny Sempai
12.SummaryEnglish: Saki teaches the club how to make balloon shapes. Sempai tries to prove her skills to her Assistant again. Madara shows off more tricks with her science knowledge. Sempai tries to practice magic while Assistant sleeps in the club room. Sempai tries to beat her stage fright by dressing in a sexy bunny costume.
